channel.title: New GFX website Project
channel.description:
Ok well guys here is how it works:
Here are some of the open spots to start off with:
PHP Coder: PHP Coder: CSS Coder: CSS Coder: Forum Moderator: Forum Moderator: Forum Moderator: Forum Moderator: Forum Moderator: Forum Admin: Forum Admin: Photoshop Designer: [hr] [hr] Ok well those are all the spots open and basically, you just post saying what you want to do. You will also have to fill out the below form. [hr] [center]Form[/center] [hr]
Your Name: What you wana do: Experiences: Will you be willing to follow rules: How often you can help:
[hr]
Ok well I will mainly be watching over the forum, and I will leave most of the main page and and CSS to the guys who are working on it. Of course I will still give you my requirements and tell you if you need to fix anything.
[hr]
[center]Forum Mod/Admin Requirements[/center]
[hr]
These are the basic requirements needed to becom a Mod or Admin on the forums. I still hold the ability to reject you the spot if I see nesisary.
1. Must have worked or used for a good amount of time. 2. Must not use fowl or abusive language towards others when offended. 3. Must know when a topic should be deleted and moved. 4. Must know that exceviness of abusing their powers will result in instant termination of power and ban. 5. Must agree not to give passwords or advantouges to friends or family, as this will result in instant IP bann and termination of all accounts. 6. Must be good at leading but not to harsh. 7. Must have a voucher for all of the above that are needed.
[hr]
[center]Contact Details[/center]
[hr]
You can contact me through MSN messenger or Email. I would recomend MSN messenger as I do not go onto my Email oftern, which will delay the response time.
MSN: xspikeyhairx@live.com
Email: xxspikeyhairxx@yahoo.com
[hr]
Please post all applications for spots. Thanks.
[hr]
Ok well then also we will be adding more spots where needed as time goes on.

webhostingtalk they have about 300 active users on all the time
[/quote]

It’s also a horrible, cluttered website which, for a web hosting/design forum, has a really shit colour scheme.[/quote]
tbh i like it. Its nice nice on the eyes and on allmost every topic you do you will get like 2 replys within 10 minutes

Read full topic
